 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁבָה‎</span> **verb** ==take captive== (Late Hebrew, Old Aramaic ***id.***;Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> (<img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">); Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שְׁבָא‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">) — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁ‎</span> [[Jer.41.14|Jer 41:14]] suffix<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְשָׁבָם‎</span> (consecutive) [[Jer.43.12|Jer 43:12]] (but read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְשָׁבָה‎</span> [[BDB#Gie|Gie]]; [[BDB#Du|Du]] conjectures <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְשׁמְמוּ‎</span>); 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁבִיתָ‎</span> [[2Kgs.6.22|2Kgs 6:22]]; [[Ps.68.19|Ps 68:19]], etc., ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּשְׁבְּ‎</span> [[Num.21.1|Num 21:1]]; [[Jer.41.10|Jer 41:10]], etc.; ***Imperative*** masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וּשְׁבֵה‎</span> [[Judg.5.12|Judg 5:12]] ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁבוֺת‎</span> [[Obad.1.11|Obad 1:11]] ***Participle active plural*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֹׁבִים‎</span> [[Isa.14.2|Isa 14:2]], etc.; ***passive masculine plural*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁבוּיִם‎</span> [[Isa.61.1|Isa 61:1]], feminine plural construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁבֻיוֺת‎</span> [[Gen.31.26|Gen 31:26]] — ***take captive*** 

**1.a.** with accusative of person, [[Num.24.22|Num 24:22]] ([[BDB#J|J]][[BDB#E|E]]), [[1Sam.30.2|1Sam 30:2]]; [[2Kgs.5.2|2Kgs 5:2]]; [[2Kgs.6.22|2Kgs 6:22]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span> instrumental) [[Jer.41.10|Jer 41:10]] (twice in verse) (but v[[Jer.41.10|Jer 41:10]] b [[BDB#Gie|Gie]] reads <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיַּשְׁכֵּם‎</span>, compare [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] Luc), v[[Jer.41.14|Jer 41:14]], [[Gen.34.29|Gen 34:29]] ([[BDB#P|P]]), [[2Chr.28.8|2Chr 28:8]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> part), + 6 t.; + [[Jer.43.12|Jer 43:12]] apparently with accusative idols (but see above; accusative land [[BDB#Gie|Gie]]). 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** accusative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֵילוֺ‎</span> [[Obad.1.11|Obad 1:11]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָֽרְכוּשׁ‎</span> [[2Chr.21.17|2Chr 21:17]], cattle, etc., [[1Chr.5.21|1Chr 5:21]]; [[2Chr.14.14|2Chr 14:14]] 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **c.** participle in periphrastic conjugation (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְשֹׁבֵיהֶם‎</span>) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְהָיוּ שֹׁבִים‎</span> [[Isa.14.2|Isa 14:2]] participle with suffix = ***their captives***, etc., [[1Kgs.8.46|1Kgs 8:46]] = [[2Chr.6.36|2Chr 6:36]]; [[Isa.14.2|Isa 14:2]]; [[Jer.50.33|Jer 50:33]], +5 t.; Passive participle [[Isa.61.1|Isa 61:1]] = ***captives***; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כִּשְׁבֻיוֺת חָ֑רֶב‎</span> [[Gen.31.26|Gen 31:26]] my daughters ***as captives of the sword***. 

**2.** with accusative of congnate meaning with verb <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁבִי‎</span> [[Judg.5.12|Judg 5:12]] ***lead captive thy captives***, compare [[Ps.68.19|Ps 68:19]]; [[2Chr.28.17|2Chr 28:17]], so (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> person) [[Num.21.1|Num 21:1]] ([[BDB#J|J]][[BDB#E|E]]), and (accusative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שִׁבְיָה‎</span>) [[2Chr.28.5|2Chr 28:5]]; [[2Chr.28.11|2Chr 28:11]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שִׁבְיוֺ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁ‎</span> [[Deut.21.10|Deut 21:10]] = ***take him captive***. **Niph\`al** ***be taken captive:*** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִשְׁבָּה‎</span>, of man [[Gen.14.14|Gen 14:14]], of beast [[Exod.22.9|Exod 22:9]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֵדֶר י‎</span> [[Jer.13.17|Jer 13:17]] 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִשְׁבּוּ‎</span>, human subject [[1Sam.30.8|1Sam 30:8]]; [[1Sam.30.5|1Sam 30:5]]; [[1Kgs.8.47|1Kgs 8:47]] = [[2Chr.6.37|2Chr 6:37]]; [[Ezek.6.9|Ezek 6:9]].
